Events that occurred on 9 July.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1944 - J.R.R. Tolkien continues writing Letter 75 (begun on 7 July).
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 339a.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 1944:
News of the oncoming of the enemy from the south-east reaches EÃ¤rnil. He and his Southern Army are already in position, and plan to meet the Wainriders at the river Poros.
T.A. 3018:
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
